comments:
Using the Web Page Editor, as soon as a facet is added to a panelGrid, but before it has had a "name" attribute added, PanelGridOperation throws the following exception:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.jst.pagedesigner.jsf.ui.converter.operations.jsf.PanelGridOperation.getChildFacetByName(PanelGridOperation.java:142)
	at org.eclipse.jst.pagedesigner.jsf.ui.converter.operations.jsf.PanelGridOperation.transform(PanelGridOperation.java:60)
	at org.eclipse.jst.pagedesigner.dtmanager.converter.internal.provisional.DefaultTransformer.transform(DefaultTransformer.java:57)
	at org.eclipse.jst.pagedesigner.dtmanager.converter.internal.provisional.DTHTMLOutputRenderer.render(DTHTMLOutputRenderer.java:86)
	at org.eclipse.jst.pagedesigner.dtmanager.converter.internal.provisional.DTTagConverter.convertRefresh(DTTagConverter.java:76)
	at org.eclipse.jst.pagedesigner.parts.ElementEditPart.refresh(ElementEditPart.java:293)
	at org.eclipse.jst.pagedesigner.parts.ElementEditPart.refresh(ElementEditPart.java:261)
	at org.eclipse.jst.pagedesigner.parts.ElementEditPart.notifyChanged(ElementEditPart.java:565)
---etc---

WHile this looks extremely ugly in the error log, there is no functional issue and the user can continue to work unaffected.
Fixed: verify in build after 2007/04/05 12:33 PDT.
